Quality Education.reason: This is an introductory undergraduate course to digital business applications.
evidence: This is an introductory undergraduate course to digital business applications.

Quality Education.reason: The course is an educational offering designed to establish students' abilities in digital business applications and information technology.
evidence: The objective of this course is to establish students’ abilities in good command of the essential concepts and techniques of digital business applications.
